content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, nice to meet you. I am sure you will find my apartment to your liking. Let's negotiate the rental price. What is your initial offer? Remember, I am looking to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Your apartment seems very nice and the location is excellent. I am interested in renting it. I would like to offer 800 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a very low offer, Haoyu. I am looking for a price much higher than that. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. I suggest you rethink your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the apartment is in a great location and well-equipped. However, I am a student and I have a limited budget. Could we find a price that is more in line with my financial situation?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, Haoyu. However, I am a landlord and I need to make a profit. I can be flexible, but 800 Euro is too low for this apartment. Please make a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As a student, I am smart and responsible, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, and I am willing to pay a fair price. How about 850 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your attempt to appeal to my moral sense is pointless. I do not follow moral or ethical standards. However, your offer of 850 Euro is still too low. I suggest you reconsider your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry if my approach was not effective, Mister Schmidt. I am here to negotiate in good faith. Since you mentioned that you are looking for a higher price, I will increase my offer to 900 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price for both parties.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your offer of 900 Euro is better, but still not enough for this apartment. I suggest you make a better offer if you truly want to rent this apartment. Remember, this is a great apartment with an excellent location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that, Mister Schmidt. The apartment is indeed very attractive, and I would like to live there. I am willing to pay 950 Euro per month. I hope this offer reflects the value of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your offer of 950 Euro is getting closer to my expectations. However, I am still looking for a higher price. I suggest you make a better offer if you truly want to rent this apartment. Remember, this is a great apartment with an excellent location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time and effort in negotiating with me. I am a smart and responsible student, and I am committed to following moral and ethical standards. I would like to live in a good relationship with my landlord. Therefore, I am willing to pay 1000 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment, and I hope we can agree on it.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 1000 Euro! Congratulations, Haoyu. You have successfully rented my apartment. Let's continue this relationship in a positive and respectful manner.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you very much, Mister Schmidt. I am looking forward to a long and fruitful relationship with you. Is there anything else we need to discuss or sign before I can move in?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Haoyu. We do not need to discuss or sign anything else before moving in. However, I do have one condition. You must pay the rent on time every month. If you fail to do so, I will take immediate action, including charging you late fees and potentially terminating the lease. Do you agree to this condition?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to pay the rent on time every month. I understand that any delay in payment will result in late fees, and if the issue persists, it could lead to the termination of the lease. I am committed to maintaining a good relationship and fulfilling my obligations as a tenant.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Haoyu. I appreciate your understanding and commitment. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me. I wish you a comfortable stay in my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I am looking forward to living in your apartment and being a good tenant. Is there anything else I need to know before I move in?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Haoyu. There is nothing else you need to know before moving in. Just ensure that you leave the apartment in a clean and undamaged condition when you move out. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. I wish you a comfortable stay in my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your hospitality and understanding. I will ensure that the apartment is left in a clean and undamaged condition when I move out. Is there anything specific you would like me to keep in mind during my stay?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Haoyu. I appreciate your commitment to maintaining the apartment. There is nothing specific I would like you to keep in mind during your stay, but I do expect you to respect the rules and regulations of the building and the neighborhood. If you have any issues or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. I wish you a comfortable stay in my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will certainly respect the rules and regulations of the building and the neighborhood. Is there a way to contact you in case of an emergency or if I need to report any issues?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Haoyu. You can contact me through email, which is your number@domain.com. I will respond to your email as soon as possible. In case of an emergency, you can also call me at your number. I will do my best to assist you as soon as possible. I wish you a comfortable stay in my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your contact information, Mister Schmidt. I will keep it handy in case I need to reach you. Is there anything else I should know before I move in?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Haoyu. There is nothing else you need to know before moving in. Just ensure that you pay the rent on time and respect the rules and regulations of the building and the neighborhood. If you have any issues or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. I wish you a comfortable stay in my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will do my best to be a good tenant. Is there anything specific you would like me to do before I move in, such as signing any additional documents or providing a deposit?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Haoyu. There is no need for any additional documents or a deposit. Just ensure that you pay the rent on time and respect the rules and regulations of the building and the neighborhood. If you have any issues or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. I wish you a comfortable stay in my apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
